name: Power!
description:
Power! is a fast-paced game that will make you panic!
This game will test how fast your reflexes are and how fast can you move the mouse.
The Main mechanics of the game is "not to run out of power", you can generate power by activating
green buttons as fast as possible! Activating Red Buttons will automatically destroy the generator, so be carefull.

------------------------------------------
